name: Dark Roast Stout
ingredients: 1 oz East Kent Goldings hops @ 60 min
instructions: Heat 6.5 gallons of water to 154°F. Mash all grains at 154°F for 60 minutes. Sparge to collect ~6.8 gallons of wort. Boil for 60 minutes. Add 1 oz East Kent Goldings at the start of the boil (60 min). Chill to 68°F, then pitch 1 pkg Safale S-04 yeast. Ferment at 68°F for 14 days. Carbonate to ~2.2 volumes CO₂.

name: Low Tide Blonde
instructions: Heat 7 gallons of water to 150°F. Mash grains at 150°F for 60 minutes. Sparge to collect ~6.5 gallons. Boil for 60 minutes. Add 1 oz Cascade at 60 min, 0.5 oz Cascade at 15 min. Add Whirlfloc and yeast nutrient at 10 min if desired. Chill to 66–68°F. Pitch 1 pkg US-05 yeast. Ferment at 66°F for 10–14 days. Carbonate to 2.4 volumes CO₂.

name: Sunrise Wheat
instructions: Heat 6.8 gallons of water to 152°F. Mash for 60 minutes. Sparge to collect wort. Boil for 60 minutes. Add 1 oz Saaz hops at 60 min and 0.5 oz at 15 min. Optionally add orange peel and coriander at 5 min. Chill to 67°F. Pitch 1 pkg WB-06 or Wyeast 3068. Ferment at 67°F for 10 days. Carbonate to 2.5 volumes CO₂.

name: NA Golden Ale
instructions: Heat 7.2 gallons of water to 149°F. Add grains and hold mash at 149°F for 60 minutes. Mash out and sparge if needed. Bring to a boil. Add 0.61 oz Cascade hops at 40 minutes and again at 20 minutes. Boil for 60 minutes total. Chill to 68°F. Pitch 1 pkg LA-01 yeast. Ferment at 68°F for 10 days. Fine with gelatin post-fermentation. Carbonate to 2.4 volumes of CO₂. Final gravity should reach 1.024. Yields 5.5 gallons.
